name: Garbage Guy Jon
description:
Race away from the city before your truck KERSPLODES! (in 30 seconds)

Featuring:

  • Little to no UI!
  • Very simple graphics
  • Minimal sound effects! (wow)
  • Zero Particle systems #advanced
  • When you're stuck, you're stuck

Music by Mercurius FM

MercuriusFM.com

W/S - Forward/Reverse

A/D - Tilt left/right

M - Mute
